data.title: Girl Names That Mean Beautiful for Your Little Beauty
data.meta_description: It's hard to top the appeal of girl names that mean beautiful, as these monikers really have it all. Get to know them on our list.

Capture the beauty of your daughter’s sweet face with girl names that mean beautiful. Featuring well-known favorites and diamonds awaiting time in the spotlight, this list of names is a rollercoaster of origins and styles, including classic cuties and out-there options. We grabbed a few of our favorites to share with you.

Of all the girl names that mean beautiful, you probably know Bella best. This Italian moniker is a favorite on her own, but she also is heard frequently as a nickname for names bearing it as a suffix, such as Isabella and Annabella. Linked to Twilight, she’s also a literary name. Similarly, there’s Bellamy, meaning “beautiful friend.” Callie and Cali also mean “beautiful” and are common today. Originally short forms of Calista, they’re popular choices standing on their own. With a sweet, girlish sound and such a great meaning, it’s no wonder why!

One of our favorite girl names that mean beautiful is Zuri. Once super rare, this African beauty is picking up some serious steam on the name charts. She’s a fun alternative to the popular Zoe, as she still has an exciting Z start and a great meaning. Zariyah shares this, though this Arabic sweetheart means “beauty and light.” She fits in well with today’s most popular names, but she only recently joined the Top 1000 girl names, making her a top pick you like something uncommon. For more standouts, see Rei, Tova, and Claribel.

Unique girl names meaning beautiful can be found in abundance. Selecting a lesser-used name is a great way to help your little one avoid going by her first name and last initial all the time in school. Jamilah is firmly in the unique category. An Arabic name, she means “beautiful” or “lovely.” Another uncommon find is Sapphira, meaning “beautiful” or “the pretty one.” It’s related to the sapphire gemstone yet is a biblical name as well. You might like Rana, too, meaning “beautiful.” Other unique girl names that mean beautiful include Maha, Calla, and Vashti.

Discover more girl names that mean beautiful on our complete list.
